channel.title: CVE Feed for Ant Media -- Ant Media Server Community Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ant Media -- Ant Media Server Community Edition

item.title: CVE-2024-3462|2024-10-10T15:36:18.852Z -- ant%20media -- ant%20media%20server%20community%20edition
item.description: Ant Media Server Community Edition in a default configuration is vulnerable to an improper HTTP header based authorization, leading to a possible use of non-administrative API calls reserved only for authorized users. All versions up to 2.9.0 (tested) and possibly newer ones are believed to be vulnerable as the vendor has not confirmed releasing a patch.
